title: The Bootleg Kev Interview: Coming Up in Radio, Going Independent, P**n Knowledge & More
description:
Bootleg Kev talks about his come up, grinding for years before getting his spot in radio, making content super early on, being independent with a syndicated show and more! https://www.instagram.com/bootlegkev/ ----- NO JUMPER PATREON http://www.patreon.com/nojumper CHECK OUT OUR NEW SPOTIFY PLAYLIST https://open.spotify.com/playlist/5te...
